title: [Large-scale] Application of Dual Hybrid Instructional Model for Secondary Vocational Education Curriculum Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Vocational Competencies and Basic Social Studies Concepts
context.additional_context: A social adaptation competency enhancement course conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the ADDIE model-based instructional design process step-by-step
Learners can plan vocational foundational competency enhancement projects using dual hybrid teaching methods
Learners can propose two or more effective online collaboration strategies in a digitally restricted environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
